akn:section.akn:heading: Delivery of a controlled substance by a pharmacy to an administering practitioner

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Notwithstanding section 802(10) of this title, a pharmacy may deliver a controlled substance to a practitioner in accordance with a prescription that meets the requirements of this subchapter and the regulations issued by the Attorney General under this subchapter, for the purpose of administering the controlled substance by the practitioner if—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Modification of number of days before which controlled substance shall be administered

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Modification of number of days before which controlled substance shall be administered
